Question.text: State whether the following statement is true or false? "In JavaScript "===" refers to the identity operator which checks equality with no type conversions".
What is true regaring inline and external CSS files?

answers.option: Inline CSS rules have the lowest priority
Inline CSS overrides any external CSS rules
All CSS rules should be stated as inline CSS rules
JavaScript is a client-side scripting language
JavaScript is a server-side scripting language
XHTML is an application of XML and can be parsed using an XML parser
HTML5 allows web pages to embed multimedia within web browsers without 3rd party plugins
HTML is a part of the HTTP protocol
